page.title: 04More about the school
page.content:
Parents are encouraged to help in the school with extra activities such as cooking and art work.
33 children stay for school dinners, favourite meals include fish fingers and chips; and sausage, baked beans and chips; which costs about 65 pence.
25 children have packed lunches, most of these bring them in small plastic suitcases with flasks for their drinks; decorations range from Fraggle Frog to Darth Vadar.
Favourite special activities include the Christmas party, theatre trip, sports day, Christmas concert and educational outings.
The school is used twice a week for evening classes.
